kieker.analysis.tt.reader.tcp.dualsocket

Class DualSocketTcpReaderStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • teetime.framework.AbstractStage
      • teetime.framework.AbstractProducerStage<IMonitoringRecord>
        • kieker.analysis.tt.reader.tcp.dualsocket.DualSocketTcpReaderStage
  • Deprecated. 
    Since 1.13. Use SingleSocketTcpReaderStage instead. This DualSocketTcpReaderStage will be kept for research purposes.

    @Deprecated
public final class DualSocketTcpReaderStage
extends teetime.framework.AbstractProducerStage<IMonitoringRecord>
    This is a reader which reads the records from two TCP ports.
    Since:
    1.14
    Author:
    Jan Waller, Nils Christian Ehmke, Christian Wulf
